Who: CYCLONUS, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Throne Room

> She smiled back but refused glenty when Cyclonus offered his elbow, by a
> reason that she didnt understand she felt uncorfotable to do it, then she
> sit down in the chair and smiled "I'll be glad to help you"then when
> cyclonus said that she was a lady with many talents she said"But fightting
> isnt mine"

Cyclonus nodded, apparently taking no offense to Nightlight's
declining of his elbow. He just sat down in his own chair as he looked
at her, shaking his head, "No lady Nightlight, I am not asking for you
to fight." Although he didn't smile so much, his tone was light and
easy.

"I have some friends who are coming to meet Hydras, and I wanted you
here to meet them with me." Cyclonus shrugged slighty, but even his
shrug was somehow genteel and courtly.

Cyclonus' communicator beeped. "Ahh, they have arrived."

Cyclonus stood and walked over to a control panel, one that would
allow him to open the front door. "They will be here shortly. You can
aid me in showing them hospitality as we await Hydras." he said.

(TAG)

Preston
